headline.main: Lacazette Strikes Again as Lyon Extend Lead
headline.print_headline: Lacazette Strikes Again as Lyon Extend Lead

docs.snippet: Alexandre Lacazette was on the spot again as Olympique Lyonnais extended their Ligue 1 lead to four points with a clinical 2-0 win at struggling RC Lens on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Alexandre Lacazette was on the spot again as Olympique Lyonnais extended their Ligue 1 lead to four points with a clinical 2-0 win at struggling RC Lens on Saturday.

headline.main: Afghan Cabinet Nominee Wanted by Interpol for Tax Evasion
headline.print_headline: Afghan Cabinet Nominee Wanted by Interpol for Tax Evasion

docs.snippet: Afghan President Ashraf Ghani's nominee for agriculture minister in his new Cabinet is on an Interpol wanted list for tax evasion in Estonia, a fact Ghani's spokesman said was unknown to his office at the time of his nomination....
docs.lead_paragraph: Afghan President Ashraf Ghani's nominee for agriculture minister in his new Cabinet is on an Interpol wanted list for tax evasion in Estonia, a fact Ghani's spokesman said was unknown to his office at the time of his nomination.

headline.main: Hosts Denied Opening Day Nations Cup Triumph
headline.print_headline: Hosts Denied Opening Day Nations Cup Triumph

docs.snippet: A late equaliser cost hosts Equatorial Guinea an opening win at the African Nations Cup finals as they drew 1-1 with Congo on Saturday before Gabon beat Burkina Faso 2-0 to top Group A....
docs.lead_paragraph: A late equaliser cost hosts Equatorial Guinea an opening win at the African Nations Cup finals as they drew 1-1 with Congo on Saturday before Gabon beat Burkina Faso 2-0 to top Group A.

headline.main: Hawaii Jury Convicts Adoption Advocate of Girls' Sex Assault
headline.print_headline: Hawaii Jury Convicts Adoption Advocate of Girls' Sex Assault

docs.snippet: A Hawaii jury has convicted an adoption advocate of sexually assaulting two girls....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Hawaii jury has convicted an adoption advocate of sexually assaulting two girls.

headline.main: Belgian, Zimbabwean Shot in Land Protest in Sierra Leone
headline.print_headline: Belgian, Zimbabwean Shot in Land Protest in Sierra Leone

docs.snippet: A Belgian and a Zimbabwean working for international agribusiness company Socfin Group have been shot during a protest over land rights in Sierra Leone, police said on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Belgian and a Zimbabwean working for international agribusiness company Socfin Group have been shot during a protest over land rights in Sierra Leone, police said on Saturday.

headline.main: Defoe's Goalscoring Debut Record Ends as Sunderland Lose
headline.print_headline: Defoe's Goalscoring Debut Record Ends as Sunderland Lose

docs.snippet: Jermain Defoe's record of scoring on his first appearance for every club he has played for came to an end as Sunderland lost 2-1 at his former club Tottenham Hotspur in the Premier League on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jermain Defoe's record of scoring on his first appearance for every club he has played for came to an end as Sunderland lost 2-1 at his former club Tottenham Hotspur in the Premier League on Saturday.

headline.main: At Least Three Killed in Charlie Hebdo Riots in Niger Capital
headline.print_headline: At Least Three Killed in Charlie Hebdo Riots in Niger Capital

docs.snippet: At least three people were killed in protests in the Niger capital against French satirical newspaper Charlie Hebdo on Saturday, police sources said, bringing the death toll to eight from two days of violence in the West African country....
docs.lead_paragraph: At least three people were killed in protests in the Niger capital against French satirical newspaper Charlie Hebdo on Saturday, police sources said, bringing the death toll to eight from two days of violence in the West African country.

headline.main: Mary J. Blige Fetes DSquared2 on Label's 20th Anniversary
headline.print_headline: Mary J. Blige Fetes DSquared2 on Label's 20th Anniversary

docs.snippet: Mary J. Blige feted designing twins Dean and Dan Caten on their DSquared2 label's 20th anniversary and Snoop Dogg brought down German designer Philipp Plein's house as Milan Fashion Week opened four days of menswear previews Saturday with a musica...
docs.lead_paragraph: Mary J. Blige feted designing twins Dean and Dan Caten on their DSquared2 label's 20th anniversary and Snoop Dogg brought down German designer Philipp Plein's house as Milan Fashion Week opened four days of menswear previews Saturday with a musical bang.

headline.main: 'Czech Capital of Beer' Becomes European Capital of Culture
headline.print_headline: 'Czech Capital of Beer' Becomes European Capital of Culture

docs.snippet: Plzen — known as the Czech capital of beer — has been officially inaugurated the European Capital of Culture for 2015....
docs.lead_paragraph: Plzen — known as the Czech capital of beer — has been officially inaugurated the European Capital of Culture for 2015.
